ERROR_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND: Misali: Kolon '{}' ma sɔrɔ DataFrame kɔnɔ .
ERROR_PLOT_GENERATION: Misali la, a bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka jatebɔ kɛ: {}
error_type: Donni ka kan ka kɛ suguya sɛrɛ ye.
call:
Weele(tɔgɔ, suguya=None, path=None, timeout=5, strict=true)
A bɛ filen dɔ ɲini tɔgɔ la (ani a bɛ se ka sɛbɛn) foli dilen dɔ kɔnɔ (walima ka bɔ CWD la) bɛ segin ka jigin ka sɔrɔ ka taa san fɛ,
ani k’a doni ka kɛɲɛ n’a suguya ye a yɛrɛma.

Paramɛtɛrɛw: .
    Tɔgɔ (STR): filen tɔgɔ basigilen, ni a ma fara a kan.
    suguya (STR, optionnel): Extension extension ('csv', 'json', 'xml').
    Sira (STR, option): ɲinini sira fɔlɔ ka bɔ.
    Waati tɛmɛnen (int, optionnel): Ɲini waati maksimali segin kɔnɔ.
    Strict (Bool, optionnel): Ni tiɲɛ don, a bɛ fili lawuli ni dosiye caman tɔgɔ ye kelen ye.

Seginw: Filen sɔrɔlen kɔnɔkow walima a si tɛ.
load_user_translations:
load_user_translations(lang_path="lang.json")
A bɛ bamanankan-falen-falen-falen-falenw Lase JSON filen dɔ ma k’u Fàra ɲɔgɔn kan ni bamanankan-falenw ye minnu bɛ Kɛ fɔlɔ.

Paramɛtɛrɛw: .
    lang_path (STR, option): sira min bɛ taa baarakɛlaw ka bamanankan bamanankan na. Defaults ka "lang.json".

Jogo:
    - Ni filen bɛ yen ani ni JSON bɛ baara la, a bɛ a kɔnɔkow fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni default translations ye .
    - Ni filen tɛ yen, a bɛ bamanankan-falen-falenw dɔrɔn de mara .
    - A bɛ lasɔminikan jira ni filen bɛ yen nka a tɛ se ka doni .
    - A bɛ diɲɛ _translations dictionnaire kura .

Kɔlɔsili: Nin baara in ka kan ka wele ka sɔrɔ ka baara kɛ ni T() baarakɛcogo ye walasa baarakɛlaw ka baarakɛcogo ka se ka baara kɛ.
switch:
Enhanced switch-case system for python. Dɛmɛnbagaw:
- Matching Keys caman bɛ sɔrɔ case kelen-kelen bɛɛ la .
- Ka bɛn ni nafa ye, suguya, regex, lambda baarakɛcogo, walima kalasi .
- Pandas ani numpy data structure support .
- async execution execution de cases .
- Match-All Mode walasa ka ɲɔgɔndan caman kɛ .
- Debug mode ka log matching cases .
async_switch:
Wrapper ka instantiate switch in async cogo. Paramɛtɛrɛw: .
- Nafa : Nafa min ka kan ka bɛn ni ko ɲɛfɔlenw ye.
- **Kwargs: Daɲɛ kolomaw sɔsɔli minnu bɛ se ka kɛ, olu tɛmɛna ka taa switch class la. Olu bɛ se ka kɛ:
  - Match_All (Bool): Aw bɛ bɛnkanw bɛɛ kɛ sanni ka jɔ fɔlɔ la.
  - Debug (Bool): Print min bɛ bɛn ani min kɛra.
  - ASYNC_MODE (Bool): A man kan ka tɛmɛ ni bolo ye yan (a bɛ wajibiya tuma bɛɛ ka kɛ tiɲɛ ye).
Misali: asyncswitch('Hello', match_all=true, debug=true)(...)
encoding_error: File encoding error (a tɛ UTF-8 ye) .
multiple_errors_title: A ye fili suguya caman sɔrɔ .
provide_file_path: Aw ye filen sira di walasa ka a lajɛ .
file_not_found_any: Filen si ma sɔrɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko '{tɔgɔ}' min bɛ sɔrɔ '{path}' kɔnɔ.
file_ambiguous: Filen caman minnu tɔgɔ ye ko ‘{tɔgɔ}’ o sɔrɔla: {Types}. Aw bɛ suguya walima baara kɛ ni Strict=False ye.
unsupported_file_type: Fiye suguya min tɛ dɛmɛ sɔrɔ: {ext}
t: A bɛ sigida sɛbɛn segin kilisi dilen dɔ kan min sinsinnen bɛ kan sugandilen kan.
show_gui_popup_description:
A bɛ popup window jira ni sɛbɛnniw kɔnɔkow ye ani visualisation optionnel ye.
A bɛ CLI ni Jupyter kaye sigida fila bɛɛ ɲɛnabɔ.

Suguya:
- Kopi/Save Functionity Changes Based on Active Tab .
- Jaa minɛcogo ɲuman Jupyter kɔnɔ .
- Fenɛtiriw ka bancogo saniyalen .

ARGS:
    Title (STR): Fenɛtiri tɔgɔ .
    Kɔnɔkow (STR): Sɛbɛnni kɔnɔkow ka jira .
    Fig (mattplotlib.ja.Ja, option): Ja min dabɔra ka kɔn .
    plot_function (callable, option): Baarakɛcogo min bɛ ja dɔ lawuli .
    Plot_Args (dict, option): Daɲɛw ka ɲɛsin plot_function ma .
load_user_translations_error: A ma se ka doni baarakɛla lang.json: {error}
redundant_true: Ni aw ye ɲɔgɔn sanga ni tiɲɛ ye, aw bɛ baara kɛ ni nafa ye k’a ɲɛsin a ma .
redundant_false: redundant comparaison ni nkalon ye, baara kɛ ni ‘not’ ye o nɔ na .
none_comparison: Ni an ma a suma ni mɔgɔ si ye, o ka kan ka baara kɛ ni ‘is’ ye ‘==’ nɔ na.
not_true_recommendation: Baara kɛli ni ‘!= true’ ye, o tɛ ko ɲuman ye, i ka jateminɛ kɛ ka bana in nɔgɔya .
not_false_recommendation: Baara kɛli ni ‘!= nkalon’ ye, o man ɲi, aw bɛ a lajɛ ka bana ɲuman dɔ kɛ .
help_usage: Baara kɛ ni dɛmɛ('function_name') ye walasa ka kunnafoni wɛrɛw sɔrɔ baara kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ kan .
help_error: Misali: function '{}' tɛ yen walima sɛbɛn tɛ a la .
preview_error_message:
Misali la, a ye fili kɛ ka ɲɛfɔli kɛ:
{filijuru}
async_preview_not_available:
ASync misali tɛ se ka jira SYNC Preview kɔnɔ.
Baara kɛ ni ‘Await AsyncSwitch(...)’ ye async sigida la.
scatter_description: A bɛ scatter plot dɔ Dabɔ walasa ka jɛɲɔgɔnya jira fɛn caman na minnu bɛ to senna.
lineplot_description: A bɛ layini plot dɔ dilan min ka ɲi waatibolodacogo walima jatebɔlenw sigicogo la.
kdeplot_description: A bɛ histogramme (histogramme) nɔgɔlen dɔ Dabɔ ni kernel density estimation ye.
violinplot_description: bɛ kunnafoni hakɛlamaw tilatilali jira kulu caman kɔnɔ.
pairplot_description: A bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya fila-fila Dabɔ kunnafonisɛbɛn dɔ kɔnɔ min bɛ jatebɔw jira minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ani minnu bɛ danfara la.
countplot_description: Bar plot min bɛ kunnafoniw tila-tilacogo caman jira.
lmplot_description: A bɛ data ni linear regression model bɛn ni dannaya yɔrɔw ye.
jointplot_description: A bɛ scatter plot ni histogrammes walima kde plots fara ɲɔgɔn kan margins kan.
swarmplot_description: bɛ kɔlɔsiliw bɛɛ jira ka fara jatebɔ basigilen jirali kan.
regplot_description: Plots data ani regression model min bɛ bɛn ni option polynomial order ye.
barplot_description: A bɛ point jateminɛw ni dannaya yɔrɔw jira i n’a fɔ rectangulaire bars.
stripplot_description: A scatter plot min na fɛn caman b’a la ka fɛn caman sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni jitter ye walasa ka a yɛrɛ tanga ɲɔgɔn ma.
large_plot_note: KƆLƆSI: Nin ko in bɛ se ka waati dɔɔnin ta ka a jira k’a sababu kɛ a bonya ye .
preview_not_available: Interactive Preview tɛ sɔrɔ nin baara in na .
get_moda_description: A bɛ jatebɔ kɛ kunnafonisɛbɛn dɔ cogoya (nafa camanba) kan. ka se ka nafa segin a ka frequency jate ma.
get_media_description: A bɛ jatebɔ hakɛ jateminɛlen (hakɛ) jatebɔ. A bɛ NAN nafaw ɲɛnabɔ ni a bɛ se ka kɛ.
get_median_description: A bɛ jatebɔ kɛ kunnafonidilan dɔ cɛmancɛ (cɛmancɛ nafa) kan. A bɛ NAN nafaw ɲɛnabɔ ni a bɛ se ka kɛ.
get_rank_description: A bɛ DataFrame kulu dɔ ka yɔrɔ (danfara) jatebɔ (danfara).
get_var_description: A bɛ jatebɔ kɛ dataframe kulu dɔ ka danfara kan.
get_desv_description: A bɛ jatebɔ kɛ dataframe kulu dɔ ka deviation standard kan.
disp_description: A bɛ segin-ka-bɔnyew segin (hakɛ, danfara, standard deviation) dataframe kulu dɔ kan.
call_description: A bɛ filenw ɲini ani k’u kalan minnu cogoya tɛ kelen ye (CSV, JSON, XML) ni ɲinini suguya caman ye.
check_syntax_description: A bɛ Python kode Sɛgɛsɛgɛ daɲɛw fɔcogo filiw la, tɔgɔ minnu ma ɲɛfɔ, ani cogoya koɲɛw.
createDB_description: Factory function ka database connection misali dɔ dilan.
exportData_description: A bɛ kunnafoniw bɔ kunnafonidilanw taabolow la ka taa cogoya caman na (CSV, JSON, XML, SQL, Excel, wdfl).
addTable_description: A bɛ tabali kura dɔ Fàra database kan ni kulusi kofɔlenw ni dantigɛliw ye.
mergeTable_description: A bɛ taabolo caman fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni SQL logic ye ni don suguya wɛrɛw ye.
join_description: A bɛ SQL jɛli kɛ tabali ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ minnu bɛ don ɲɔgɔn na suguya caman na.
drop_description: Tables (tabali) minnu bɛ bɔ database (daɲɛgafe) la, olu bɛ bɔ, i bɛ se k’a kɛ ni Cascade (Cascade) ye.
cascadeDelete_description: A bɛ cascade deletion kɛ ka da condition kan, handling dependences.
recursiveQuery_description: A bɛ ɲininkali segin-seginlenw Kɛ ni tabali fɔcogo caman ye (CTE).
windowFunction_description: A bɛ finɛtiri baarakɛcogo (row_number, rank, etc.) kɛ tabali kunnafoniw na.
executeRawSQL_description: A bɛ SQL ɲininkali raw Kɛ k'a ɲɛsin database ma.
show_description: A bɛ database tabali ni data jira jatebɔ-yɔrɔ dɔ la.
hbar_description: A bɛ bar chart horizontal dɔ dilan ni labels ni kulɛriw ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw sago ye.
vbar_description: A bɛ bar chart jɔlen dɔ dilan ni labeliw ni kulɛriw ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw sago ye.
pie_description: A bɛ pie chart dɔ dilan ni labeliw ye minnu bɛ se ka kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔw sago ye, kulɛriw, ani kɛmɛsarada la.
boxplot_description: A bɛ kɛsu dɔ labɛn walasa ka kunnafoniw tilatilali jira kuluw kɔnɔ.
histo_description: A bɛ histogramme dɔ Dabɔ walasa ka jatebɔ fɛn dɔ jatebɔcogo jira.
heatmap_description: A bɛ funteni hakɛ dɔ Dabɔ walasa ka kunnafoniw ye minnu bɛ i n’a fɔ matiriyali ni kulɛri kodɔnni ye.
table_description: A bɛ tabali yecogo dɔ Dabɔ ka Bɔ data arrays walima dataframes la.
normalize_description: A bɛ 0 ni 1 cɛ array (yɔrɔ) dɔ Kɛ ni min-max scaling (scaling) ye.
conditional_description: A bɛ sariyaw sigi senkan minnu bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka kulu kura sɔrɔ DataFrame kɔnɔ.
convert_file_description: A bɛ filenw sɛmɛntiya cogoya wɛrɛw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ (SHP, DBF, XML, wdfl) ka kɛ CSV ye.
Switch_description: Synchronous switch implementation ni pattern matching formats caman.
switch_description: Wrapper function for natural syntax usage de la switch synchronous.
AsyncSwitch_description: Asynchrone switch waleyali ni pattern matching formats caman ye.
async_switch_description: Wrapper baarakɛcogo ka ɲɛsin switch asynchrone asynchrone baarakɛcogo ma.
config_description: Duniya bɛɛ lajɛlen labɛncogo daɲɛgafe min bɛ moduluw sigicogo kan.
fig_to_img_description: A bɛ matplotlib ja dɔ sɛmɛntiya ka kɛ ja sɛrɛkili ye walasa ka baara kɛ ni a ye ɲɛjirali wɛrɛw la.
format_number_description: Formats numéros avec customizable decimal places ani formatting kɛmɛsarada la.
load_user_translations_description: A bɛ bamanankan-falen-falen-dosiyɛriw Lase minnu ɲɛfɔlen dòn baarakɛlaw fɛ walasa ka bamanankan-falen-falenw janya walima k’u Lajɔ.
register_description: Decorator ka baarakɛcogo walima kalanw sɛbɛn diɲɛ sɛbɛn kɔnɔ.
set_language_description: A bɛ kan min bɛ yen sisan, o sigi bamanankan bamanankanw na.
t_description: Bamanankan baarakɛcogo min bɛ daɲɛ bamanankan na, o bɛ segin kilisi dilen dɔ kan sisan kan na.
